mapper.select: SELECT appointment_school_personnel_number AS appointmentSchoolPersonnelNumber , personnel_common_appointment_code AS personnelCommonAppointmentCode , haksa_team.team_code AS teamCode , haksa_department.dept_code AS deptCode , haksa_job_rank.job_rank_code AS jobRankCode , haksa_job_type.job_type_code AS jobTypeCode , haksa_job_group.job_group_code AS jobGroupCode , appointment_appoint_day AS appointmentAppointDay , appointment_registration_date AS appointmentRegistrationDate , appointment_modification_date AS appointmentModificationDate FROM ilban_appointment, haksa_team, haksa_department, haksa_job_rank, haksa_job_type, haksa_job_group WHERE ilban_appointment.team_code = haksa_team.team_code AND ilban_appointment.dept_code = haksa_department.dept_code AND ilban_appointment.job_rank_code = haksa_job_rank.job_rank_code AND ilban_appointment.job_type_code = haksa_job_type.job_type_code AND ilban_appointment.job_group_code = haksa_job_group.job_group_code
